front.title: Add 100.64/10 prefixes to Locally-Served DNS Zones registry.

abstract.t: [RFC6598] specified that: "reverse DNS queries for 100.64/10 MUST NOT be forwarded to the global DNS infrastructure". This document formally requests that IANA add the associated zones to the "Locally-Served DNS Zones" to prevent such queries accidently leaking to the global DNS infrastructure.
